channel.title: Data Structures and algorithms on Justin Thomas
channel.description: Recent content in Data Structures and algorithms on Justin Thomas

item.title: From Greedy Guesses to Optimal Solutions: Mastering the House Robber Problem
item.description: The House Robber problem is a popular problem in the field of Dynamic Programming. You have to find the maximum amount of money that can be stolen from a row of houses, given that no two adjacent houses can be robbed.
